page_content:
Datel Advansys Limited

Datel Advansys Limited PaaS Offering

The Paas solution includes design, configuration, implementation and monitoring and management of highly, available infrastructure from 2 UK data centres

Features

  • Tier 3 and tier 4 designed UK data centres
  • High speed connectivity between data centres
  • Highly available, scalable, secure IT infrastructure
  • Designed, configured, implemented and managed
  • Multiple ISP's for resilient Internet connectivity
  • Offsite backup vault facility
  • High levels of physical and logical security
  • Access to staff with over 25 years IT experience
  • Proven processes, procedures and methodologies
  • Agentless based monitoring tools

Benefits

  • Customers can scale the solution as the business requires
  • Infrastructure can be deployed within days
  • You only pay for what you need, no Capex
  • Higher service levels available to the business
  • Highly available, scalable, secure IT infrastructure offering site availability
  • Access to the latest Microsoft Operating software when needed
  • Access to 24 x 7 levels of service
  • The service is based from 2 UK data centres
  • Market leading efficiency around power and cooling.
  • Monitored & managed by IT professionals

Pricing

£125 per device per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Year
